entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of showers. Low plus 1. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of showers early this evening. Becoming partly cloudy this evening. Wind south 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming southwest 20 early this evening then west 30 gusting to 50 overnight. Low plus 1. Forecast issued 4:00 PM ADT Thursday 6 April 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of rain showers or flurries. High plus 4. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 30 percent chance of rain showers or flurries late in the morning and in the afternoon. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50. High plus 4. UV index 5 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM ADT Thursday 6 April 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 5. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries in the evening. Wind northwest 40 km/h gusting to 60. Low minus 5. Wind chill minus 14 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM ADT Thursday 6 April 2023
